snippet.title: Little Cities | Launch Trailer | Meta Quest VR
snippet.description:
Little Cities, the eagerly anticipated cozy VR city creator, is available right now (exclusively on Meta Quest and Quest 2) for just $19.99 / £14.99 / €19.99: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299/ 

Purple Yonder's made-for-VR title makes strategic city creation fuss-free, fun, and accessible.

Built from the ground up for VR, and tailored to play beautifully on the Quest platform, Little Cities lets players create wholesome miniature cities in idyllic island locations. Build your creations from a humble settlement to a bustling metropolis. With an exquisitely crafted soundtrack and charming visuals, Little Cities is as much about escapism to a relaxing world as it is about strategy.

Little Cities will continue to grow through post-launch updates, the first two of which were recently revealed as hand tracking support and cosmetics.
----
💙 Buy Now - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299/
----
🏗️Developed by Purple Yonder
🧰Published by nDreams
----
👍 Subscribe - https://www.youtube.com/user/nDreamsVR?sub_confirmation=1
----
💻 Learn More - http://ndreams.com/games/little-cities
----
🐦 Twitter - https://twitter.com/nDreamsVR
💬 Discord - https://discord.com/invite/ndreams
👽 Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/user/nDreamsVR
📱 TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@ndreamsvr
📷 Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ndreams_vr/
💼 LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/ndreams/

#LittleCities #VR
